title: Static ReservationCard Component
description: Create a static ReservationCard.tsx component. Card displays: name, event date/time, address. Includes photo icon (if image attached). Full details accessible via modal.
acceptance_criteria: Displays: name, event date, time, address on card face
Photo icon visible only when image_url is present
Click opens ReservationDetailModal with full info
No dynamic type-checking — component only handles Reservation type
Styled consistently with VoucherCard (same grid, palette, spacing)
Grid layout works on mobile (1 col), tablet (2 col), desktop (3 col)
files_to_touch: Remove old dynamic card renderer references for reservation type
completion_summary: Created 3 files in src/components/reservations/: ReservationCard.tsx (displays name, formatted date badge with upcoming/past color states, address with MapPin icon, time with Clock icon, sage green #8A9A8B accent strip — visually distinct from VoucherCard which uses burgundy), ReservationDetailModal.tsx (bottom-sheet on mobile / centered on sm+, CalendarDays + Clock + MapPin icons, zoomable image, past-event badge, edit/delete buttons), ReservationGrid.tsx (1→2→3 col grid, empty state with Add CTA in sage green). All typed with Reservation from src/types/reservation.ts. Zero tsc errors.
notes: Design should be visually distinct from VoucherCard (different accent or icon treatment) so users can tell them apart at a glance.
